meanings.definition: The land along the edge of a river or sea.
meanings.sent1: The rivage was covered in colorful pebbles.
meanings.sent2: We walked along the rivage, feeling the cool breeze from the water.
meanings.sent3: The playful dog chased seagulls along the rivage.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts flowed like a river, gently touching the rivage of her mind.
meanings.sent5: The rivage sparkled under the golden sunset, a peaceful sight.

meanings.definition: The shore or coast of a body of water.
meanings.sent1: Seashells lined the rivage, brought in by the tide.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen gathered at the rivage, ready to set sail.
meanings.sent3: The children built sandcastles on the rivage, giggling with delight.
meanings.sent4: The rivage stood strong against the crashing waves, a guardian of the land.
meanings.sent5: The rivage whispered secrets of the sea to those who listened closely.
